long_description: The lightweight SKS S-Blade rear fender offers low-profile protection that can be quickly and easily mounted and unmounted for ultimate convenience. Single "blade" design sits over your bike's rear wheel, preventing water, mud and muck from splashing up your back. Quick mounting system attaches to your bike's seat post and allows for easy angle adjustment, letting you dial in coverage and clearance.
short_description: The lightweight SKS S-Blade rear fender offers low-profile protection that can be quickly and easily mounted and unmounted for ultimate convenience.
